body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25721](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25721) (refactor: Replace BResult with util::Result by ryanofsky)
* [#25673](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25673) (refactor: make member functions const when applicable by aureleoules)
* [#25667](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25667) (assumeutxo: snapshot initialization by jamesob)
* [#25666](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25666) (refactor: wallet, do not translate init options names by furszy)
* [#25616](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25616) (refactor: Return `BResult` from WalletLoader methods by w0xlt)
* [#25601](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25601) (util: Make `BResult` error a generic type instead of only `bilingual_str` by w0xlt)
* [#25504](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25504) (RPC: allow to track coins by parent descriptors by darosior)
* [#25499](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25499) (Use steady clock for all millis bench logging by MarcoFalke)
* [#25390](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25390) (sync: introduce a thread-safe smart container and use it to remove a bunch of "GlobalMutex"es by vasild)
* [#24914](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24914) (wallet: Load database records in a particular order by achow101)
* [#24897](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24897) ([Draft / POC] Silent Payments by w0xlt)
* [#24683](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24683) (Add and use ForEachWallet by promag)
* [#20205](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20205) (wallet: Properly support a wallet id by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
